name: Way True Life Charitable Society

address: Near Rto, Opp Kene Complex, Birla College Road

briefDescription: WTL working with among the poor and underprivileged Street CHILDREN, WOMEN, YOUTH and COMMUNITIES (SLUM) Projects in slum area cities. Give them Fundamental Right, Empowerment & Care their self sustain, progress, and whole development through EDUCATION, HEALTH, ADVOCACY & REHABILITATION, in the living in poverty and injustice Cities of Kalyan, Thane, Mumbai Maharashtra INDIA.OUR PROJECT’s-:1)	Community Health & Development, Empowerment Project for Children & Women.2)	Street Children Outreach Project- For Poor’s & Unprivileged Street Children, Child Labour, Rag pickers Boys & Girls.3)	VIJAYA ASHRAM /CHILDREN HOME Project- for children’s are mainly having Street Children, orphan, single parent, runaway from home, homeless, poor community, unprivileged. 4)	ASHA (Hope) Project- for Rag pickers Children (Girls & Boys) who are rag picking on the Kalyan Dumping Ground.
